languages.text: Джай Хейдари несколько дней пребывала в лихорадочном ажиотаже, докучая команде рассказами о некоем "подвиге, прославившем ее имя в веках" и настойчивыми предложениями "обмыть новенькие погоны". Прежде чем офицеры успели выяснить, в чем причина такого возбуждения, наваждение оставило женщину. По словам приближенных, ныне пришедшая в себя госпожа Хейдари упорно делает вид, что вышеописанного эпизода вообще не было.

Jae Heydari spent several days in feverish excitement, bothering the crew with stories of some "heroic exploit that would make her name famous for centuries" and persistent demands that they "raise a glass for her new promotion." Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.
languages.original_text: Джай Хейдари несколько дней пребывала в лихорадочном ажиотаже, докучая команде рассказами о некоем "подвиге, прославившем ее имя в веках" и настойчивыми предложениями "обмыть новенькие погоны". Прежде чем офицеры успели выяснить, в чем причина такого возбуждения, наваждение оставило женщину. По словам приближенных, ныне пришедшая в себя госпожа Хейдари упорно делает вид, что вышеописанного эпизода вообще не было.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari spent several days in feverish excitement, bothering the crew with stories of some "heroic exploit that would make her name famous for centuries" and persistent demands they "raise a glass to her new promotion." Before the officers could discern a reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to the reports, mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

According to the reports, mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

languages.text: 这几天来，婕伊·海达利表现出了狂热的兴奋。她一直在讲述某些“将会她的名字流芳百年的英雄事迹”来打扰船员们，并坚持要求船员“为她最近的晋升举杯庆祝”。还没等军官弄清楚她究竟为何如此激动，她就从狂热的状态中恢复过来了。据称，海达利女士已经恢复了理智，并固执地假装这种事情根本没发生过。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari spent several days in feverish excitement, bothering the crew with stories of some "heroic exploit that would make her name famous for centuries" and persistent demands that they "raise a glass for her new promotion." Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

traits.locale_text: 这几天来，婕伊·海达利表现出了狂热的兴奋。她一直在讲述某些“将会她的名字流芳百年的英雄事迹”来打扰船员们，并坚持要求船员“为她最近的晋升举杯庆祝”。还没等军官弄清楚她究竟为何如此激动，她就从狂热的状态中恢复过来了。据称，海达利女士已经恢复了理智，并固执地假装这种事情根本没发生过。

languages.text: Jae Heydari pasó varios días en febril excitación, importunando a la tripulación con historias de alguna «hazaña heroica que haría famoso su nombre durante siglos» y persistentes peticiones de que «brindaran por su nuevo ascenso». Antes de que los oficiales pudieran discernir la razón de tanta agitación, la obsesión la abandonó. Según los informes, Heydari ha entrado en razón y se obstina en fingir que el asunto nunca ocurrió.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari spent several days in feverish excitement, bothering the crew with stories of some "heroic exploit that would make her name famous for centuries" and persistent demands that they "raise a glass for her new promotion." Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari pasó varios días en febril excitación, importunando a la tripulación con historias de alguna «hazaña heroica que haría famoso su nombre durante siglos» y persistentes peticiones de que «brindaran por su nuevo ascenso». Antes de que los oficiales pudieran discernir la razón de tanta agitación, la obsesión la abandonó. Según los informes, Heydari ha entrado en razón y se obstina en fingir que el asunto nunca ocurrió.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは熱に浮かされた高揚感で数日を過ごして、「何世紀も彼女の名前を知れ渡らせる英雄冒険」話を語り、「彼女の新しい昇進を祝って乾杯」することをしつこくせがんでクルーを困らせた。士官がこの昂揚の原因を突き止める前に、ジェイに取り憑いていた何かが落ちる。報告によると、ヘイダリ嬢は正気を取り戻して、頑なにそもそもそんなことは起こらなかったというフリをしているらしい。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari spent several days in feverish excitement, bothering the crew with stories of some "heroic exploit that would make her name famous for centuries" and persistent demands that they "raise a glass for her new promotion." Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは熱に浮かされた高揚感で数日を過ごして、「何世紀も彼女の名前を知れ渡らせる英雄冒険」話を語り、「彼女の新しい昇進を祝って乾杯」することをしつこくせがんでクルーを困らせた。士官がこの昂揚の原因を突き止める前に、ジェイに取り憑いていた何かが落ちる。報告によると、ヘイダリ嬢は正気を取り戻して、頑なにそもそもそんなことは起こらなかったというフリをしているらしい。

languages.text: Jae Heydari a passé plusieurs jours dans un état d'exaltation, racontant sans cesse un certain « exploit héroïque qui la rendrait célèbre pendant des siècles » et demandant continuellement que les membres d'équipage « lèvent leur verre à sa promotion ». Son obsession a disparu avant que les officiers ne puissent découvrir les raisons d'une telle agitation. D'après les rapports, la maîtresse Heydari a repris se esprits et persiste à dire que l'incident ne s'est jamais produit.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari spent several days in feverish excitement, bothering the crew with stories of some "heroic exploit that would make her name famous for centuries" and persistent demands that they "raise a glass for her new promotion." Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari a passé plusieurs jours dans un état d'exaltation, racontant sans cesse un certain « exploit héroïque qui la rendrait célèbre pendant des siècles » et demandant continuellement que les membres d'équipage « lèvent leur verre à sa promotion ». Son obsession a disparu avant que les officiers ne puissent découvrir les raisons d'une telle agitation. D'après les rapports, la maîtresse Heydari a repris se esprits et persiste à dire que l'incident ne s'est jamais produit.

languages.text: Jae Heydari verbrachte mehrere Tag in fieberhafter Aufregung und belästigte die Crew mit Geschichten von "heldenhaften Taten", die ihren Namen "über Jahrhunderte hinweg berühmt" machen würden, und mit ständigen Aufforderungen, man sollte mit ihr "auf die neue Beförderung anstoßen". Bevor die Offiziere ergründen konnten, was dieses Verhalten ausgelöst hatte, verschwand die Besessenheit wieder. Berichten zufolge ist Herrin Heydari zu Sinnen gekommen und gibt nun stur vor, dass die Episode nie stattgefunden hat.

Before the officers could discern the reason for such agitation, the obsession left her. According to reports, Mistress Heydari has come to her senses and is stubbornly pretending the episode never happened in the first place.
